Package index

All functions

area()
Calculate the area of every square of a grid
fill()
Fill missing values in an array
as.gts() gts()
Create a 'gts' object.
image(<map>)
Draw an image plot with geographical coordinates and coastlines.
integrate(<gts>)
Vertical integration of a gridded time series.
interpolate()
Interpolation of bivariate data
is_ocean() is_land()
Are the points in the ocean (or land)?
make_grid()
Make a rectangular grid
map.axes2()
Add geographical axes to a map
map_details()
Add details to a map
mask() `mask<-`()
Extract, create or assign ocean/land masks.
merge_gts()
Merge a data.frame and a GTS object.
read_grid()
Read the grid from a file
read_gts()
Read a netCDF variable into a Gridded Time-Series.
read_static()
Read an static variable from a netCDF file
regrid()
Regridding
stl_array()
Seasonal Decomposition of Gridded Time Series
stl_array2()
Seasonal Decomposition of Gridded Time Series
subset(<gts>) subset(<grid>) subset(<static>)
Subsetting a spatial time series object
transform_coordinates()
Transform coordinates between Coordinate Reference Systems (CRS)
update_grid()
Update grid
